description.narrative: Capacity enhanced at state and district levels for planning, implementation, budgeting and public financial management for most disadvantaged children., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Sanitation. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 2: Protective and learning environment Programme Component Results (PCR) 3: Adolescent participation and empowerment

description.narrative: The guiding principles for Child-Friendly Schools and Systems (CFSS) were integrated into education plans, and the Educational Management Information System/Unified District Information System (EMIS/UDISE) for Education was strengthened to support monitoring and implementation of the Right of Children to Free and Compulsory Education (RTE) Act. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of districts that have plans to roll out essential elements of CFSS norms, including WASH in Schools and Disaster Risk Reduction in RTE/SSA plan
